item.title: Exception Help
item.dc:creator: @deadlyhorror deadlyhorror
item.description:
@deadlyhorror wrote:

Original:

if (playerRights == 2) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("<col=16759296><shad=16759296>[Administrator]<img=2> "+ Misc.optimizeText(playerName) +" has just logged in."); } } }

One I added:

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("cody")) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("<col=16759296><shad=16759296>[Head Admin]<img=2> "+ Misc.optimizeText(playerName) +" has just logged in."); } } }

I only want it to say Head Admin, Not the other one but I do want it to say that for the other admins.

Read full topic

item.title: Exception Help
item.dc:creator: @deadlyhorror deadlyhorror
item.description:
@deadlyhorror wrote:

[quote=“Host Gushers, post:2, topic:516719”]change the first line so it reads a name, here is an example:

I know, I added a custom one for them:

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("cody")) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("<col=16759296><shad=16759296>[Head Admin]<img=2> "+ Misc.optimizeText(playerName) +" has just logged in."); } } }

But it says both of them when he logs in:

Ex: [Head Admin] Cody has logged in
[Administrator] Cody has logged in

^ That’s what it does, I have to add an exception for him in the original code.

Read full topic

item.title: Exception Help
item.dc:creator: @deadlyhorror deadlyhorror
item.description:
@deadlyhorror wrote:

Can someone help me, I’m trying to make custom yells when staff log in but I made em and it says the new ones I made and also the ones that are set for their rights. Can someone help me make an exception in the original code for those players?

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""+ Config.CO_OWNER +"")) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("<col=15695415><shad=15695415>[Co-Owner]<img=2> "+ Misc.optimizeText(playerName) +" has just logged in."); } } }

Like I wanna make an exception in this so it doesnt say it for certain people.

Read full topic
